description: Submission under Condition 1.30 for non-material minor changes to definitions defined in the Glossary to conditions of the Section 73 planning permission ref: F/04687/13 for the Brent Cross Cricklewood Regeneration Area to the following definitions; Bridge Structure B7 (Living Bridge),Claremont Avenue, Claremont Park Improvements, Claremont Road Junction North, Clitterhouse Playing Fields Improvements (Part 1), Clitterhouse Playing Fields Improvements (Part 2), Critical Infrastructure (Pre-Phase 1A (North)), Critical Infrastructure (Pre-Phase (South)), Phase 1B (South), Tempelhof Link Road, Tilling Road East Improvements
site_name: Brent Cross Cricklewood Regeneration AreaNorth West London
